scripts.start: cd venv/scripts && activate && cd ../.. && python manage.py runserver
scripts.start_prod: cd /venv/bin && source activate && cd ../.. && python manage.py runserver
scripts.migrations_local: cd venv/scripts && activate && cd ../.. && python manage.py makemigrations carts && python manage.py makemigrations users && python manage.py makemigrations products && python manage.py makemigrations main && python manage.py makemigrations delivery && python manage.py makemigrations liqpay_app && python manage.py migrate
